Scouring Strike.name: Scouring Strike
Scouring Strike.flavor: You charge your foe with incredible speed, scouring its flesh with your weapon and spinning it around so your allies can rush into position.
Scouring Strike.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage. You and each ally adjacent to the target can shift 2 squares as a free action.
Scouring Strike.special: When charging, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack.

One Thousand Cuts.name: One Thousand Cuts
One Thousand Cuts.flavor: You and your allies assault your foe with attacks from all sides like the full force of the brutal desert wind, giving it no respite from its wounds.

One Thousand Cuts.onMiss: Half damage, and ongoing 10 damage (save ends).
One Thousand Cuts.special: When charging, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack.

Desert Glide.name: Desert Glide
Desert Glide.flavor: You and your allies glide across the battlefield like sand snakes in the dunes.
Desert Glide.target: You and each ally in the burst
Desert Glide.effect: Each target can move his or her speed + 2 as a free action.
